originalText.text: Dr. Brescia is by far the BEST Pediatrician in town. My family and I are so grateful to have had her as I our pediatrician for the last two decades. My 21 year old son still wants to be seen by her even though he has graduated to the adult clinic. He always says no one will ever come close to how loving, caring and professional she is. Team Dr. Brescia all day everyday!! üíïüôåüèºüíï

originalText.text: I just had to leave a review because - I have not seen Dr. Brescia since I was about 12 years old. I am now 22 and I wish she still was my doctor. My mom & I still speak about how amazing she was to us. I hope she is still practicing when I have my own. Miss & Love this office so much!!

text.text: I just had to leave a review because - I have not seen Dr. Brescia since I was about 12 years old. I am now 22 and I wish she still was my doctor. My mom & I still speak about how amazing she was to us. I hope she is still practicing when I have my own. Miss & Love this office so much!!

originalText.text: She is the best pediatrician NY has ever seen. A lovely lady with a beautiful welcoming smile. She listens to the patients and gives ample time in understanding the problem and diagnosing the cause of an illness. My baby loves her and feels comfortable with her. Moreover she will always call you back if she has missed your call. The staff are also very friendly and attentive to your needs. I am glad that i have found her as my son's pediatrician.

originalText.text: Dr. Brescia has been our lives since 2008. There is absolutely not one negative thing I can say about her. She is experienced, caring, respectful....etc.... a true professional. We will follow her wherever she goes (not in the stalking way). My family is lucky to have Dr. Brescia as our pediatrician.

originalText.text: Dr. Brescia is the best pediatrician ever.  She is our family Doctor. The most caring , lovable and attentive Doctor you can ever have.  Love her!!!
